Understate: The claim understates the fact that there will be a tax increase for property owners in order to fund the court-mandated funding of Memphis City Schools.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the tax increase is solely for funding the schools and not for running city government, which may be a problematic assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there will be a tax increase by stating that there will not be a tax increase to run city government.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to back up the assertion that city government services will be funded with the same amount of property tax revenues as the previous year.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the tax increase that are not addressed in the claim.
